name: Morae Global
description:
Morae Global is an award-winning, global professional services organization that delivers tailored, cost-effective legal, risk and compliance solutions. 
Founded in 2005, we were built from the ground up to help General Counsels and the companies they represent to solve complex legal and compliance challenges presented by the exponential growth of regulation and information.  We combine technology, process, and fact development to create risk-measured, cost-optimized solutions. 
Our clients consist of legal and compliance departments in the world's leading corporations, and our services are tailored to four key industries — Financial Services, Life Sciences, Technology, and Energy.  Reach out to us to see how we can help.
